Package edu.ncsu.csc216.ticket_manager.model.manager

Class TicketList

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.ticket_manager.model.manager.TicketList
public class TicketList extends Object
This class maintains a list of tickets that can be manipulated in various ways including adding, removing deleting and more
Author:
Max Farthing
